name: Outrigger on the Lagoon Fiji

reviews.text: My wife and I have just returned from 8 nights here - during which time we attended a close friends' wedding. This was our second visit to Fiji in about 8 years - we previously stayed at the Shangri-La.
reviews.title: A WONDERFUL PLACE WITH OUTSTANDING STAFF

reviews.text: The Outrigger on the Lagoon has just blown us away with great facilities, a genuinely friendly, warm and caring staff and a lovely environment.
reviews.title: Fantastic Family Getaway

reviews.text: We stayed in a garden bure (468 was excellently located for privacy, quiet and ready access to the pool and restaurants), and appreciated the Talai butler service. Friends stayed in rooms in the main hotel and were very comfortable and happy there. Nothing was too much trouble, everything was undertaken with smiles and a genuine desire to make our stay relaxed, memorable and happy. There were many families staying at the Outrigger during our stay but we didn't find this any issue at all - indeed we were very impressed at the caring approach towards ALL guests, young and old(er) by staff.
reviews.title: Perfect resort for a family holiday!!

reviews.text: The 3 restaurants we used during our stay were all incredibly well run, unhurried, clean and offered a fantastic and varied menu. Bar service including poolside was relaxed and enjoyable.
reviews.title: Love Outrigger on the Lagoon in Fiji

reviews.text: Our friends' wedding was excellently arranged by the hotel people and despite a rainy day, went without a hitch and was thoroughly enjoyed by all 30 guests.
reviews.title: Brilliant for Family Holidays

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from the Outrigger after spending 7 nights there. We stayed in a Deluxe Ocean View Room, with Talei Butler service.
reviews.title: Great Resort, Amazing food !!

reviews.text: To get this type of room was quite expensive, and we are a little unsure as to what we paid the extra for. We were to receive champayne and canopies every evening in our room, however, we soon learned if you are not in your room when they are delivering, such you need to phone them to have it delivered.
reviews.title: A fantastic memorable holiday made special by our Talai butlers.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were a bit surprised by this as there was no mention of this anywhere, nor is there any mention of what the Talei bulter will provide you. We met a few people who also had this type of room and had no idea about the champayne and canopies as they had never been in the room, therefore, never received them.
reviews.title: Warm, welcoming, relaxing, perfect

reviews.text: Also the room was with an Ocean View, we met others who had a standard room and apart from the Ocean View rooms being closer to the resturants, pool, beach etc, there was no difference in the rooms, in fact we noted their rooms were bigger with nicer balconies.
reviews.title: great resort and great service

reviews.text: The food was amazing not one dissappointing meal, however, we did feel that the buffet resturant was extremly over priced and therefore, only ate there once for the mexican evening. The Sundowner was great & the Barvari amazing.
reviews.title: Beautiful and relaxing!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from 7 days staying in a Deluxe Ocean View Room at the Outrigger Resort in Fiji. The room and the hotel are lovely (it is very family orientated so can be hard to chill out by the pool for a length of time with kids everywhere) and the service was second to none.
reviews.title: Great place to visit - for a shorter stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: While we stayed at the hotel we had a treatment at the Bebe Spa which was lovely (and the view amazing, well worth checking out the cocktails over sunset). We also enjoyed a fantastic dinner at the Ivi restaurant one evening, we were surprised the restaurant wasn't busier but they were busy the night before. The canapes and cocktails in the room each night were a lovely touch.
reviews.title: Fantastic Honeymoon Getaway and Fijian Experience

reviews.text: Couple of things to note:
reviews.title: Great Family Holiday

reviews.text: 1. The food is not as good as it has been made out to be. We dined at all of the establishments during our stay and were pretty unimpressed (Ivi was the definite exception). We found the food bland at the Thai themed place and we had a sweet tandoori pizza at the Sundowner which frankly wasn't great. In the end we decided to have a large late breakfast and grab a burger/ fish and chips as an early dinner by the pool. If you aren't big eaters I wouldn't bother with the food vouchers, but the good thing is you can just buy one days worth so you can see if they will work for you in the long term.
reviews.title: Fabulous Family Holiday at Outrigger

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 2. The beach is not really a swimming beach. To be fair during our stay it rained 4 out of the 7 days, but people should be aware that the beach is severely impacted by the tides and at low tide best you can do is wade out to the reef. The coral has also been impacted by pollution so the best place to go snorkeling is on the right side of the beach. Due to the water levels you can only do the beach water activities at high tide which can sometimes be at the times you want to get out and about during the day, but on some days it was only at 7am so best to plan your days around the tides. I would always recommend grabbing a pair of the reef shoes for walking on the beach as it is quite painful to walk on in some areas due to the amount of crushed up coral on the beaches.
reviews.title: Great place to relax and pamper

reviews.text: Have just come back from a 10 day stay at this beautiful resort, what an amazing place.
reviews.title: PARADISE

reviews.text: We stayed in a superior room which was kept beautifully clean and was just enough room for the four of us, the view was beautiful looking over the gardens., couldnt fault it in anyway.
reviews.title: first time in fiji

reviews.text: The restaurants were first class, most amazing selections of beautifully fresh foods on different nights.
reviews.title: Another fantastic holiday at Outrigger !!

reviews.text: As for the staff the most wonderful genuine friendly people i have ever met, they couldnt do enough for you. A big BULA BULA to our friends Tai and Sereli who our boys loved.
reviews.title: So relaxing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thankyou Outrigger for making our holiday so special , we are already saving up to return next year.
reviews.title: Nice relaxing break

aka: Outrigger On The Lagoon Fiji Hotel Sigatoka
